conversion_verification.notes: The 2D plan has been correctly transformed into an isometric 3D cutaway with depth and structural volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent 3D representation. Walls have consistent height and thickness; floor planes are distinct, and the viewing angle is ideal for a cutaway.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Highly accurate layout. All rooms (Kitchen, Utility, Toilet, Bedroom, Living/Dining, Balcony) are present and correctly positioned. Wall proportions and partitions match the 2D plan accurately.

interior_elements.notes: Furniture placement is nearly 1:1 with the reference. Kitchen sink, stove, sofas, dinette, and bedroom set are accurately modeled and scaled.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft lighting. Distinguishable geometry. 2 points deducted for the omission of realistic window glass/frames in some exterior openings, though railings are present.

detected_errors.description: The window in the bedroom and the sliding door to the balcony are simplified; glass panes are not explicitly rendered, just the frames/openings.

summary: An exceptionally faithful 3D transformation that preserves the exact geometry, room configuration, and furniture layout of the original 2D architectural plan.
